pullRequest.title: Update docs on snapshot restore settings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes:
This commit updates the documentation for the snapshot restore settings in the example elasticsearch configuration file.
From what I have gathered from testing and reading the code I concluded that the docs were out of date. By default normal users can restore snapshot if they have sufficient priviliges which is contrary to what the documentation said before this commit.
Thought that it might be worth an update as to not confuse other people when they are reading the example configuration for elasticsearch security plugin 🙂
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message: Update docs on snapshot restore settings

nodes.bodyText: Previous comment does mention that snapshots can be restored by normal users. I do like the wording of your version more. Thanks for the update.
